entry.title: iPhone 5c Front Camera and Sensor Cable
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Front Camera
Price: 14.99

Important Notice: This item can take 5-10 days to fulfill.


Replace a damaged front camera and sensor cable for an iPhone 5c and fix problems with the front-facing camera or the light and proximity sensors. If you are having problems with noise canceling this may be the culprit.

entry.title: iPhone 5c Lightning Connector and Headphone Jack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Charging Port
Price: 24.99

Important Notice: This item can take 5-10 days to fulfill.


The Lightning Connector and Headphone Jack assembly is your solution to connectivity and charging problems. If your phone isn't charging, has connectivity problems, is not recognized when plugged into your computer via USB, or if the microphone isn't detecting sound, this part compatible with iPhone 5c could fix the problem. But if you have a clogged headphone jack, there are easier fixes than replacing the partu2014you should check out the GripStick.

entry.title: iPhone 5C Connector Charging Port
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Small Parts
Price: 4.99

Description

This iPhone 5C Connector Charging Port Assembly is designed to allow the replacement of your broken headphone jack and charging connector.

Notice

If your device is no longer charging or if you are having difficulties hearing sounds when an auxiliary cord is connected, replacing the connector assembly should fix the problem.

Warranty

Unlockr offers a 1 year on this item. Our warranty does not cover physical damage caused by the technician or any other reason. Please see our full warranty and returns policy for extra details.

Part Type iPhone Charging Port Assembly
Compatible Model iPhone 5C (4")
Model Number A1532Â

entry.title: iPhone 5c Camera and Sensor Cable Copper Shield Sticker
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Other Part
Price: 6.99

Important Notice: This item can take 5-10 days to fulfill.


Replace a torn or missing camera and sensor cable shield sticker in an iPhone 5c. This copper tape connects the front-facing camera and sensor cable to the LCD shield plate. The adhesive strip is visible in the Front-Facing Camera and Sensor Cable Replacement guide.

entry.title: iPhone 5c Home Button Ribbon Cable
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Home Button
Price: 5.99

Important Notice: This item can take 5-10 days to fulfill.


The Home Button Ribbon Cable is compatible with iPhone 5c and includes the home button switch and ribbon cable. If your button click function is stuck, sticky, or malfunctioning, replacing the cable and actuator will solve the problem. This part does not include the plastic home button cover.

entry.title: iPhone 5c Audio Control and Power Button Cable
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Power Button
Price: 24.99

Important Notice: This item can take 5-10 days to fulfill.


If your volume or power buttons have no clicking action or your mute switch doesn't work properly anymore, this replacement Audio Control and Power Button Cable may be the part you need. This iPhone 5c compatible cable connects the volume buttons, mute/silent button, and power button. It also contains contacts which the vibrator rests on in order to connect it to the logic board.

entry.title: iPhone 5c LCD Shield Plate
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Shield Plate
Price: 9.99

Important Notice: This item can take 5-10 days to fulfill.


Replace a bent or damaged LCD shield plate in an iPhone 5c. This plate fits between the LCD and the rest of the phone's internal parts where it disburses heat and protects the back of the LCD.

entry.title: iPhone 5 and 5c Home Button
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Home Button
Price: 6.99

Important Notice: This item can take 5-10 days to fulfill.


This home button is compatible with both iPhone 5 and iPhone 5c. If your button is scratched or cracked, this replacement part will make your phone look good as new. Keep in mind, this is just a button coveru2014not the actual actuator that's integrated in the home button cable. So if your home button is not working properly, the button cable is the more likely culprit. We sell the home button ribbon cable compatible with iPhone 5 and the home button ribbon cable compatible with iPhone 5c too.

The iPhone 5C LCD shield plate is used for heat disbursement and protection for the LCD. It is installed between the main body and the LCD of your iPhone 5C. The screws for iPhone 5C required for the installation are not included.

Warranty
